titles.title: Tribal Energy Reauthorization Act
Tribal Energy Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize certain programs under the Office of Indian Energy Policy and Programs of the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.
Tribal Energy Reauthorization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 116-198.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Hoeven with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-310.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 612.
